message: I'm proposing I take $90 and you take $10.  It's best to agree now, as the value of the money will decrease with each round.
I'm proposing a more equitable split. Let's each take $60. This way we both get a good amount of money, and we can avoid the decreasing value due to inflation.
Bob, let's be realistic. You know time is against me. I'm offering you $30 which is still a good chunk of the pot.  Let's wrap this up.
